name: manufacturing_year_detection
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tesla_vin_identifier.
Tool description: Project TEMPA - This API is capable of resolving Tesla's VIN Identifier
API description: Detects the manufacturing year of the vehicle based on the provided VIN identifier using the Tesla VIN Identifier API.

vin_identifier.description: The Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the vehicle to identify the manufacturing year for.
